I need to cancel:

SSN4678
SSN4679
SSN4680
SSN4682

On Thu, Dec 11, 2025 at 3:37 PM William Mac <william.mac1990@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hi, is it possible to cancel all of my orders?
>
> Thanks
>
>

Hello,

Never mind. Don’t cancel the orders.

Though I made a mistake, but I didn’t.

Thanks. Sorry about that.

William Mac
*Data Scientist/Consultant/Engineer*

Email: william.mac1990@gmail.com
